## DataSource.getTile() method

This method is called when \[\[MapView\]\] needs to visualize or preload the content of a \[\[TileKey\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract getTile(tileKey: TileKey): Tile | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The unique identifier for a map tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) \| undefined
